name: Karan Tejwani
position: IB Risk at JP Morgan || ex-Credit Suisse || IIT Kharagpur || M.S. Finance @ University of Edinburgh
about: I am a hard and fast learner who can accelerate the training program. Being a motivated self-starter has helped me to pay better attention to detail and believe in accuracy and perfection. I am a people’s man and can take advantage of my communication skills to bond within a team. Time management is something I have taken control of late, which has helped me to categorize assignments on priority. To top all this, my blissful demeanour has always allowed me to be a good stress buster for my team members. With an appropriate background I believe I can perform better than expected.
